meanings.definition: A type of decorative stitch used to secure the edge of fabric
meanings.sent1: She added delicate hemstitches to the tablecloth.
meanings.sent2: The dress was beautifully finished with intricate hemstitches.
meanings.sent3: The hemstitches on the napkins made them look fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was like hemstitches, securing everything in place.
meanings.sent5: The hemstitches on the pillowcases were like tiny works of art.

meanings.definition: To sew a hemstitch on fabric
meanings.sent1: She carefully hemstitches the curtains for a neat finish.
meanings.sent2: Remember to hemstitch the edges to prevent fraying.
meanings.sent3: He hemstitches so fast, it's like watching a sewing machine in action.
meanings.sent4: Her love for sewing hemstitches the family together.
meanings.sent5: The tailor hemstitches with precision and skill.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a hemstitch on fabric
meanings.sent1: Her hemstitches were admired by all who saw her work.
meanings.sent2: The hemstitches on the scarf were perfectly spaced.
meanings.sent3: The competition was fierce, but her hemstitches stood out.
meanings.sent4: The hemstitches on the quilt held memories within each stitch.
meanings.sent5: His passion for hemstitches shone through in every project.
